agent_runner.hint: Select the runner for AI conversations. Defaults to AstrBot's built-in Agent runner, which supports knowledge base, persona, and tool calling features. You don't need to modify this section unless you plan to integrate third-party Agent runners like Dify or Coze.

dashscope_agent_runner_provider_id.description: Alibaba Cloud Bailian Application Agent Runner Provider ID

ai.hint: When using non-built-in Agent runners, the default chat model and default image caption model may not take effect, but some plugins rely on these settings to invoke AI capabilities.

default_provider_id.hint: Uses the first model when left empty

default_image_caption_provider_id.hint: Leave empty to disable; useful for non-multimodal models

provider_id.hint: Users can also select session-specific STT models using the /provider command.

kb_fusion_top_k.hint: Number of results returned after fusing search results from multiple knowledge bases

kb_final_top_k.hint: Number of results retrieved from the knowledge base. Higher values may provide more relevant information but could also introduce noise. Adjust based on actual needs

kb_agentic_mode.hint: When enabled, knowledge base retrieval becomes an LLM Tool, allowing the model to autonomously decide when to query the knowledge base. Requires the model to support function calling.

websearch_tavily_key.hint: Multiple keys can be added for rotation.

websearch_baidu_app_builder_key.description: Baidu Qianfan Smart Cloud APP Builder API Key

enable.hint: When enabled, Agent can use tools and resources in the sandbox environment, such as Python tool, Shell, etc.

shipyard_endpoint.hint: API access address for Shipyard service.

shipyard_access_token.hint: Access token for accessing Shipyard service.

shipyard_max_sessions.hint: Maximum number of Shipyard sessions an instance can handle.

max_context_length.hint: Discards the oldest parts when this count is exceeded. One conversation round counts as 1, -1 means unlimited

dequeue_context_length.hint: Number of conversation turns to discard at once when maximum context length is exceeded

context_limit_reached_strategy.description: Handling When Model Context Window is Exceeded
context_limit_reached_strategy.hint: When 'Truncate by Turns' is selected, the oldest N conversation turns will be discarded based on the 'Dequeue Conversation Turns' setting above. When 'Compress by LLM' is selected, the specified model will be used for context compression.

llm_compress_instruction.hint: If empty, the default prompt will be used.

llm_compress_keep_recent.hint: Always keep the most recent N turns of conversation when compressing context.

llm_compress_provider_id.description: Model Provider ID for Context Compression
llm_compress_provider_id.hint: When left empty, will fall back to the 'Truncate by Turns' strategy.

llm_safety_mode.hint: Add safety guardrails to model replies.

identifier.hint: When enabled, user ID information will be included in the prompt.

group_name_display.hint: When enabled, group name information will be included in the prompt on supported platforms (OneBot v11).

datetime_system_prompt.hint: When enabled, current time information will be appended to the system prompt.

sanitize_context_by_modalities.hint: When enabled, sanitizes contexts before each LLM request by removing image blocks and tool-call structures that the current provider's modalities do not support (this changes what the model sees).

unsupported_streaming_strategy.hint: Select the handling method for platforms that don't support streaming responses. Real-time segmented reply sends content immediately when the system detects segment points like punctuation during streaming reception

wake_prefix.hint: If the wake prefix is / and the additional chat wake prefix is chat, then /chat is required to trigger LLM requests

prompt_prefix.hint: You can use {{prompt}} as a placeholder for user input. If no placeholder is provided, it will be added before the user input.

reachability_check.hint: When running the /provider command, test provider connectivity in parallel. This actively pings models and may consume extra tokens.

dual_output.description: Output Both Voice and Text When TTS is Enabled

unique_session.hint: When enabled, group members have independent contexts.

disable_builtin_commands.hint: Disable all built-in AstrBot commands such as help, provider, model, etc.

enable_id_white_list.hint: When enabled, only sessions in the whitelist will be responded to.

id_whitelist_log.hint: When enabled, INFO level logs will be output when a message doesn't pass the whitelist.

wl_ignore_admin_on_group.description: Administrator Group Messages Bypass ID Whitelist

wl_ignore_admin_on_friend.description: Administrator Private Messages Bypass ID Whitelist

enable.hint: You need to manually install the baidu-aip library.

extra_keywords.hint: Additional keyword blocklist, supports regular expressions.

no_permission_reply.description: Reply When User Has Insufficient Permissions

emojis.hint: Telegram only supports a fixed reaction set, reference: https://gist.github.com/Soulter/3f22c8e5f9c7e152e967e8bc28c97fc9

plugin_set.hint: All non-disabled plugins are enabled by default. If a plugin is disabled on the plugins page, selections here will not take effect.

log_base.hint: Base for logarithmic intervals, defaults to 2.0. Value range: 1.0-10.0.

split_words.hint: Split when any word in the list is detected

content_cleanup_rule.hint: Remove specified content from segmented content. For example, `[ã€‚?!]` will remove all periods, question marks, and exclamation marks.

ltm.description: Group Chat Context Awareness (formerly Chat Memory Enhancement)

image_caption.hint: Requires setting a group chat image caption model.

image_caption_provider_id.hint: Used for image understanding in group chat context awareness, configured separately from the default image caption model.

whitelist.hint: Whitelist filtering is disabled when empty. Use /sid to get IDs.

t2i_strategy.hint: Text-to-image strategy. `remote` uses a remote HTML-based rendering service, `local` uses PIL for local rendering. When using local, place a TTF font named 'font.ttf' in the data/ directory to customize the font.

t2i_endpoint.hint: Uses AstrBot API service when empty

t2i_template.hint: When enabled, you can customize HTML templates for text-to-image rendering.

t2i_active_template.hint: This value is maintained by the text-to-image template management page.

pip_install_arg.hint: When installing plugin dependencies, Python's pip tool will be used. Additional arguments can be provided here, such as `--break-system-package`.

pypi_index_url.hint: PyPI repository URL for installing Python dependencies. Defaults to https://mirrors.aliyun.com/pypi/simple/

callback_api_base.hint: External services may access AstrBot's backend through callback links generated by AstrBot (such as file download links). Since AstrBot cannot automatically determine the externally accessible host address in the deployment environment, this configuration item is needed to explicitly specify how external services should access AstrBot's address. Examples: http://localhost:6185, https://example.com, etc.

timezone.hint: Timezone setting. Please enter an IANA timezone name, such as Asia/Shanghai. Uses system default timezone when empty. For all timezones, see: https://data.iana.org/time-zones/tzdb-2021a/zone1970.tab

http_proxy.hint: When enabled, proxy will be set by adding environment variables. Format: `http://ip:port`

maibot.hint: When enabled, messages will be processed and returned by MaiBot. MaiBot uses its own personality, memory, and thought flow system to generate responses.

enable.hint: When enabled, all messages for this bot will be processed by MaiBot, bypassing AstrBot's plugin and LLM pipeline.

help.helpText: Don't understand the configuration? See {documentation} or {support}.
